text: Marco hooked me up with a fresh fade! Dude knows what he's doing. Chill vibe in the shop.

text: Cut was aight, not exactly what I wanted. Barber seemed in a rush, barely talked.

expected.summary: Cut was aight, not exactly what I wanted.

text: Man, worst cut ever. Hairline all messed up. John gotta do better, smh.

text: Servicio brutal, el fade quedÃ³ perfecto y la mÃºsica estaba on point. Gracias!

expected.summary: Servicio brutal, el fade quedÃ³ perfecto.

text: Cut was decent, but left side uneven. Asked for a shape-up, ended up losing too much length.

text: BEST BARBER IN TOWN!!! CARLOS AND MIKE ARE ABSOLUTE LEGENDS!!! ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥

text: terrible experience never coming back again total waste of money

text: Tommy gave me the cleanest taper I've ever had. The line-up was crispy and the beard trim was on point. Shop atmosphere is dope, good music, and everyone's friendly. Been going to Tommy for 3 years now and he never disappoints. Highly recommend if you're in the area!

expected.summary: Tommy gave me the cleanest taper with crispy line-up and perfect beard trim.

text: Solid spot. Gets busy on weekends tho.

expected.summary: Solid spot but busy on weekends.

text: Mi pana Luis es el mejor! Siempre me deja con el fade perfecto. La barberÃ­a tiene buen ambiente y todos hablan espaÃ±ol. Precios justos tambiÃ©n.

text: ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ Amazing cut! ğŸ’¯ Will definitely be back! ğŸ”¥

text: Asked for a mid fade got a low fade. Asked for it to be fixed, barber got attitude. Won't be returning.

expected.summary: Asked for mid fade, got low fade, barber had attitude.

text: The shop looks nice inside

expected.summary: The shop looks nice inside.

text: Robert and James both work here and they're both skilled. I usually see Robert but if he's busy James is just as good. Can't go wrong with either one.

expected.summary: Robert and James are both skilled, can't go wrong with either.

text: Overpriced for what you get tbh. Nothing special.

expected.summary: Overpriced, nothing special.

text: Clean shop, professional service, reasonable prices. What more can you ask for? Been a regular for 2 years.

expected.summary: Clean shop, professional service, reasonable prices.

text: Had to wait 45 minutes past my appointment time. When I finally got in the chair the cut was rushed. Not acceptable.

expected.summary: Waited 45 minutes past appointment, cut was rushed.

text: ğŸ’ˆğŸ’ˆğŸ’ˆ FIRE CUTS HERE ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ ASK FOR RICO ğŸ’¯ğŸ’¯ğŸ’¯

expected.summary: Fire cuts here, ask for Rico!

text: It's ok I guess. Not bad but not great either. Might try somewhere else next time.

expected.summary: It's ok, not bad but not great either.

text: Been coming here since I was a kid. Antonio has been cutting my hair for 15 years. He knows exactly what I like and always delivers. This place is like family to me.

expected.summary: Antonio has been cutting my hair for 15 years, always delivers.

text: First time here and definitely my last. Barber didn't listen to what I wanted and just did whatever. Left with a haircut I didn't ask for.

expected.summary: First and last time, barber didn't listen to what I wanted.

text: Free haircut scam dont fall for it they will rob you blind!!!

expected.summary: Free haircut scam, don't fall for it.

text: The barber David is professional and skilled. Clean workspace, good hygiene practices. I appreciate the attention to detail.

expected.summary: David is professional and skilled with attention to detail.

text: Meh.

expected.summary: Meh.

text: I walked in and asked for a simple buzz cut. 20 minutes later I had the worst haircut of my life. Uneven, patchy, just terrible.

expected.summary: Worst haircut of my life - uneven and patchy.

text: Great experience overall! The shop was clean, the wait wasn't too long, and my barber (I think his name was Steve or Steven?) did a fantastic job. Definitely coming back!

expected.summary: Great experience, clean shop, barber did fantastic job.

text: Average cut at best. Nothing to write home about.

expected.summary: Average cut, nothing special.

text: I've been to dozens of barbershops and this is hands down the best. Alex is a true artist. He takes his time and makes sure everything is perfect. The shop is immaculate and the vibe is always positive. Can't recommend this place enough!

expected.summary: Best barbershop, Alex is a true artist who takes his time.

text: Called to make an appointment, they said come in at 3pm. Showed up at 3pm and they said they don't take appointments. Wasted trip.

expected.summary: Showed up for appointment, they don't take appointments.

text: Decent fade, good price, friendly staff. I'll be back.

expected.summary: Decent fade, good price, friendly staff.

text: Real talk this place is trash don't waste your time fam

expected.summary: Don't waste your time.

text: Victor hooked it up! Best shape-up I've gotten in years. He's got that attention to detail that's hard to find these days.

expected.summary: Victor gave best shape-up with great attention to detail.

text: It was fine.

expected.summary: It was fine.

text: Went in for a simple trim. Barber barely spoke English and completely misunderstood what I wanted. Ended up with way too much taken off.

expected.summary: Barber misunderstood, took off too much hair.

text: This is the type of place where you become a regular. Everyone knows your name, remembers how you like your cut. Marcus, Tony, and Big E all do great work.

expected.summary: Great place where everyone knows your name and remembers your cut.

text: Showed up on time for my appointment with Jake. He was running 30 min late but apologized and gave me a discount. Cut was great, very professional about the delay.

expected.summary: Jake ran late but apologized, gave discount, cut was great.

text: Never again. Worst service ever.

expected.summary: Never again, worst service ever.

text: Pretty good spot. Gets the job done. No complaints.

expected.summary: Pretty good spot, no complaints.

text: Been seeing Chen for my cuts and he's consistently excellent. Never had a bad experience here. The shop is always clean and the prices are fair.

expected.summary: Chen is consistently excellent, clean shop, fair prices.

text: Walked in without appointment, they fit me in right away. Quick, professional service. Happy with the result.

expected.summary: Quick professional service, fit me in without appointment.

text: Expensive and not worth it. I've had better cuts for half the price elsewhere.

expected.summary: Expensive and not worth it.

text: If you want a proper fade go see Malik. Dude is an absolute wizard with the clippers. My go-to spot every time.

expected.summary: Malik is a wizard with clippers, my go-to spot.

text: Soy cliente desde hace 5 aÃ±os. Javier siempre me atiende bien y el corte queda perfecto. Ambiente familiar y precios buenos. Recomendado 100%.

text: Barber was on his phone the whole time. Barely paid attention to what he was doing. Unprofessional.

expected.summary: Barber was on phone, unprofessional.

text: Standard barbershop. Nothing fancy but they get the job done at a fair price.

expected.summary: Standard barbershop, fair price.

text: Outstanding service from start to finish. Andre took his time, asked questions about what I wanted, and executed perfectly. This is now my regular spot.

text: Dirty shop, rude staff, mediocre cut. Save yourself the trouble and go elsewhere.

expected.summary: Dirty shop, rude staff, mediocre cut.

text: Good barbershop with skilled barbers. I see Ray and he always does a solid job. Wait times can be long on weekends but it's worth it.
